text: The 2011 FIFA Puskás Award was the third FIFA Puskás Award. It was awarded on January 9, 2012, during the 2011 FIFA Ballon d'Or Gala in Zürich, Switzerland. Santos player Neymar was the winner of the award, for his goal against Flamengo during the 2011 Campeonato Brasileiro Série A season. For the first time, the vote percentages were not made public. This would be the only time until the 2019 edition of the award.
